levels.description: Immediately marks an enemy unit (prioritizes heavier [Sarkaz] enemies), making them easier to be targeted by allies and inflicting DEF <@ba.vup>{def:0%}</>. Each attack deals <@ba.vup>{attack@atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage
